mapper.select: SELECT A.NO AS NO ,A.CONTENT AS CONTENT ,A.PRICE AS PRICE ,TO_CHAR(A.ACCOUNT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ACCOUNT_DATE ,AC.NAME AS CATEGORY_NAME ,A.ACCOUNT_CNO AS ACCOUNT_CNO FROM ACCOUNT A JOIN ACCOUNT_CATEGORY AC ON A.ACCOUNT_CNO = AC.NO JOIN MEMBER M ON A.WRITER_NO = M.NO WHERE A.WRITER_NO = #{no} ORDER BY A.ACCOUNT_DATE DESC

SELECT A.NO AS NO ,A.CONTENT AS CONTENT ,A.PRICE AS PRICE ,TO_CHAR(A.ACCOUNT_DATE, 'YY.MM.DD') AS ACCOUNT_DATE ,AC.NAME AS CATEGORY_NAME FROM ACCOUNT A JOIN ACCOUNT_CATEGORY AC ON A.ACCOUNT_CNO = AC.NO WHERE A.NO = #{no}
SELECT AC.NAME AS CATEGORY_NAME ,SUM(A.PRICE) AS PRICE_CNT FROM ACCOUNT A JOIN ACCOUNT_CATEGORY AC ON (A.ACCOUNT_CNO = AC.NO) WHERE A.WRITER_NO = 5 GROUP BY AC.NAME
